metadata.inclusion:
Press configuration button 3 times. LED3 is ON.
Press and hold once more for 4 seconds
metadata.exclusion:
Press configuration button 3 times. LED3 is ON.
Press and hold once more for 4 seconds
metadata.reset:
Press configuration button 25x times. LED 1 is ON. Press and hold once more for 4 seconds to confirm.
Please use this procedure only when your network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
